Html:
How is the best way to use the FonetDriver.Render to write to a MemoryStream?  I open a test file, from an ASP page.I keep getting a closed stream returned.  I am trying to render a PDF to memory.  Any help would be most appreciated.

Thanks,

Pete
Never mind.  I downloaded the source and tweaked the driver to leave the stream open...

Set  CloseOnExit = false;  so that it keeps the Memorystream open. Default  value is true

 

I hope this is of help. 

 

Amir
